Articles.Content:
The goal of the game is to name where the quote the user above used came from.

Rules: 

Don't quote other threads. Stick to internet, tv, real quotes, ETC

Keep it appropriate

Have Fun!

NO Roleplaying!

If they get it right reply with a yes or a no.

If it's wrong, tell them where it's from

I'll start:

Is That Dandruff, or parmesan?

Your guess is as good as mine,

Because you can't zoom in on instagram.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T16:12:18Z" title="08/09/2015 04:12  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by Dark Junior**
